text: @PressSec @H_Town_74 @realDonaldTrump Well done!  These are the comeback of jobs he's responsible for the loss of due to his inept handling of the coronavirus, whose "embers" are still killing thousands of people a day! He gets no credit for causing the problem to begin with!
